messages.title: It's Neck & Neck
messages.content: YouGov polling says it's going to be close. Top polling company YouGov have released a prediction for the result here in Oxford West & Abingdon constituency that puts Lib Dem Layla Moran and the right wing Conservative Nicola Blackwood absolutely neck and neck.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting Labour just helps the Conservatives win here. With the Greens having stood down to allow Layla Moran a clear run against the Tories, Labour voters will now be crucial. If they decide to vote Labour on Thursday they will help the Conservatives with this seat. If they decide to lend their vote to Layla Moran, the right-wing Conservatives will be beaten.

community.content: Layla Moran fought to protect the Green Belt when Nicola Blackwood and Conservative councillors pushed through developments on numerous Green Belt sites.
We need an MP who will fight for local services like the Children's Centres

endorsements.endorsement: Layla Moran fought to protect the Green Belt when Nicola Blackwood and Conservative councillors pushed through developments on numerous Green Belt sites. Layla has my vote.

endorsements.endorser: Emily Smith, Alison Rooke and Margaret Crick
endorsements.endorsement: Nicola Blackwood has failed to deliver on her promise of funding for the full Lodge Hill interchange before development starts. We're all backing Layla Moran to win this Thursday.

endorsements.endorser: Begbroke resident and campaigner Dawn Glatz
endorsements.endorsement: I'm backing Layla Moran to win on Thursday because we need an MP who will listen to local residents about the impact of development and stand up for the community and our local environment.
We need an MP who will fight for local services like the Children's Centres. Voting Conservative will mean even more local services will face the axe.

Neil Fawcett endorsed Layla Moran for fighting for local services like the Children's Centres.
